main.name: Welli Ardiansyah
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Welli Ardiansyah! I am a self-taught programmer, since I was in school I love the world of programming and am very interested in it as it is my daily hobby, I like new technology recently and I really want to master it, in the programmer world I have been working for 7 years but If combined with the beginning I can program since 2013 last year I can already speak the programming language that I like the most when I first learned I was very interested in the Python programming language and until now I continue to read to get better at programming in Python and other technologies in programming.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.company: FaberHost Indonesia - Digital and IT Solution
work.title: Software Engineer (Fullstack) - (OnSite)
work.description: Here I work as a website development and android & ios mobile application development, where I develop a system or website in collaboration with PT. Wahana Tata Mandiri (faberhost.com), and create a security system based on phpcode such as making an IP bot filter.

work.title: Software Engineer (Fullstack) - (OnSite)
work.description: Here I am as a development system ERP, CRM, HRM, GL, MFG INVENTORY and I hold several other systems such as e-project system, file system, file system, inventory system. For every day I work to maintain this system and the maintance system so that it can always run well, revise some code every day so that this system does not have bugs and errors.

work.title: Software Engineer (Fullstack) - Freelance
work.description: Here I made a payment gateway system with Python and Django framework and database use DynamoDB, this payment gateway for the needs of the shopify plugin and integrated with Xendit.

work.title: Development Project Manager (Full Remote)
work.description: Here I work as a website development and android & ios mobile application development, where I develop a system or website in collaboration with PT. Wahana Tata Mandiri (faberhost.com), and create a security system based on phpcode such as making an IP bot filter.

work.company: PT. Elektronik Distribusi Otomatisasi Terkemuka (Nabati Groups)
work.title: Backend Developer (Full Remote)
work.description: Here I am as a backend developer with workers to maintain and look for bugs to fix also here I am creating a new upcoming project.

work.title: Backend Developer (Hybrid)
work.description: Here I am a backend developer and am tasked with creating systems such as CRM, Internal SupperApps and for customer needs, also making music or karaoke application systems.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
